comment: пока не завершен квест про карантин

languages.text: "Две семьи нашли мертвыми в южных блоках теневых кварталов, все тела — в язвах. Район закрыт на карантин, нарушителей убивают на месте. Ничего неожиданного!"

"Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, and all who breach the restrictions are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"
languages.original_text: "Две семьи нашли мертвыми в южных блоках теневых кварталов, все тела — в язвах. Район закрыт на карантин, нарушителей убивают на месте. Ничего неожиданного!"

traits.locale_text: "Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, all violators are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"

"Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, all violators are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"

"Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, and all who breach the restrictions are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"

"Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, and all who breach the restrictions are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"

languages.text: “有两户人家死在了阴影区的南部街区，他们的尸体千疮百孔。阴影区已经被隔离，所有违反隔离条例的人都会被当场击毙，这没什么意外的！”
languages.original_text: "Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, and all who breach the restrictions are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"

traits.locale_text: “有两户人家死在了阴影区的南部街区，他们的尸体千疮百孔。阴影区已经被隔离，所有违反隔离条例的人都会被当场击毙，这没什么意外的！”

languages.text: «Se han encontrado dos familias muertas en los bloques sureños de los barrios bajos, con los cadáveres cubiertos de úlceras. La zona ha sido puesta en cuarentena bajo pena de muerte a todo aquel que se salte la restricción. ¡Que nadie diga que no se le advirtió!».
languages.original_text: "Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, and all who breach the restrictions are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"

traits.locale_text: «Se han encontrado dos familias muertas en los bloques sureños de los barrios bajos, con los cadáveres cubiertos de úlceras. La zona ha sido puesta en cuarentena bajo pena de muerte a todo aquel que se salte la restricción. ¡Que nadie diga que no se le advirtió!».

languages.text: 「シャドウクォーターの南ブロックで、2組の家族が遺体で発見されました。体はアザだらけです。当該エリアは隔離されて、規制違反とみなされた住民はその場で殺されています。よくあることですね！」
languages.original_text: "Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, and all who breach the restrictions are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"

traits.locale_text: 「シャドウクォーターの南ブロックで、2組の家族が遺体で発見されました。体はアザだらけです。当該エリアは隔離されて、規制違反とみなされた住民はその場で殺されています。よくあることですね！」
「シャドウクォーターの南ブロックで、2組の家族が遺体で発見されました。体はアザだらけです。当該エリアは隔離されて、規制違反とみなされた住民はその場で殺されています。よくあることですね！」

languages.text: "Zwei Familien würden in den südlichen Blocks der Schattenquartiere tot aufgefunden. Ihre Leichen waren mit Geschwüren bedeckt. Der Bereich wurde unter Quarantäne gestellt, und alle, die gegen die Einschränkungen verstoßen, werden sofort getötet. Das kommt nicht überraschend!"
languages.original_text: "Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, and all who breach the restrictions are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"

traits.locale_text: "Zwei Familien würden in den südlichen Blocks der Schattenquartiere tot aufgefunden. Ihre Leichen waren mit Geschwüren bedeckt. Der Bereich wurde unter Quarantäne gestellt, und alle, die gegen die Einschränkungen verstoßen, werden sofort getötet. Das kommt nicht überraschend!"

languages.text: « Les corps de deux familles ont été retrouvés dans la partie sud du Quartier des Ombres, couverts de lésions. La zone a été placée en quarantaine, et toute personne tentant d'entrer ou de sortir du périmètre sera abattue à vue. Vous êtes prévenus ! »
languages.original_text: "Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, and all who breach the restrictions are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"

traits.locale_text: « Les corps de deux familles ont été retrouvés dans la partie sud du Quartier des Ombres, couverts de lésions. La zone a été placée en quarantaine, et toute personne tentant d'entrer ou de sortir du périmètre sera abattue à vue. Vous êtes prévenus ! »

languages.text: "Gölge Mahalli'nin güney bloklarında iki aile ölü bulundu. Cesetlerinin iltihap kaplı çıkması üzerine bölge karantina altına alındı. Yasağı delmeye kalkan herkes görüldükleri yerde infaz ediliyor. Şaşırdık mı? Tabii ki hayır!"
languages.original_text: "Two families were found dead in the southern blocks of the Shadow Quarters, their bodies covered in sores. The area has been quarantined, and all who breach the restrictions are being killed on the spot. No surprise there!"

traits.locale_text: "İki aile Gölge Mahali'nin güney bloklarında ölü bulundu. Bedenleri iltihap kaplıydı. Bölge karantina altına alındı ve sınırlamaları aşmaya çalışan herkes görüldükleri yerde öldürülüyorlar. Şaşırtıcı bir durum değil!"
